body_html:
@ylxie I'm unable to reproduce on Linux. I haven't tried on a Windows machine yet (will get to that soon).

If it is the same problem that #6873 fixes, then it is possible that you'll see the stack overflow on Windows but not Linux. In addition, when you'll see the stack overflow on Windows is highly variable. Furthermore, python will just crash (on windows) without an error message.

body:
@ylxie I'm unable to reproduce on Linux. I haven't tried on a Windows machine yet (will get to that soon).

If it is the same problem that #6873 fixes,  then it is possible that you'll see the stack overflow on Windows but not Linux. In addition, when you'll see the stack overflow on Windows is highly variable. Furthermore, python will just crash (on windows) without an error message.
